title: The Chornyi Stryzh brigade is part of the Ukrainian forces
aboutUsText: This brigade operates as part of the 103rd Separate Terroir Defense Brigade named after Andrey Sheptytsky. Commander Yuriy Savchuk said that thanks to drones, which are used for reconnaissance and strikes on enemy positions, the Ukrainian military gains strategic advantages, including the ability to precisely hit the enemy and save the lives of infantry.
aboutDroneText: With the help of drones, the brigade can detect enemy positions in advance and react as effectively as possible. With the help of drones, the brigade can detect enemy positions in advance and react as effectively as possible.
